attributes.action: stop criminals being protected by the law and give victims the right to defend themsleves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are the victim of a crime and pursue the criminal you should have the right to retrieve your stolen goods using any means necessary.

If the criminal gets hurt in the process they should not have the right to sue you or the police.

Criminals would soon learn that crime does not pay and can lead to serious injury.
